definitions.definition: A strong vertical post of timber or iron , fixed to the ground and/or on the deck of a ship, to which the ship's mooring lines etc are secured.
A similar post preventing vehicle access to a pedestrian area, to delineate traffic lanes, or used for security purposes.

main_definition: ( nautical ) A strong vertical post of timber or iron , fixed to the ground and/or on the deck of a ship, to which the ship's mooring lines etc are secured.
secondary_definitions: A similar post preventing vehicle access to a pedestrian area, to delineate traffic lanes, or used for security purposes.
